title: TEMPLATE Miniature modern chair made of wood, cardboard and fabric in 1:12 scale | PDF
description: To make the chair you will need: fireplace matches, wooden popsicle sticks, thin cardboard, corrugated cardboard, fabric and 2 types of glue. The price includes 1 PDF file of one sheet with templates and description of the parts. The finished chair and other items are shown in the photo for demonstration. Please note that the diagram is made at a scale of 1:12 and cannot be enlarged without losing image quality. You can use the finished templates as you wish, including for sâ€¦
